column1: Local Foods////I absolutely love Local Foods! I've been coming here since it opened
column2: I've always ordered the Harvest salads with shrimp
column3: the dressing is SO good. My only complaint is that mostly ALL of their sandwiches are not gluten free friendly
column4: which means if I want to eat a sandwich I have to bring my own gluten free bread
column5: that's kind of a bummer! I do appreciate that they have gluten free desserts and the best fresh squeezed juice. I always bring my friends here and they love it.
